case.state: He's quite the looker, isn't he, Mari? We shouldn't focus on one another, but on this fine Engineer instead. I hope you bought plenty of condoms for the both of us, Corgi.
You can't hide behind your princess forever, Corgi~
Well, at least you don't feel ashamed about it, but you aren't making it any fun for us.
Oh, come on! If you want to be degraded, go look for someone else to do it.
I know I'm good-looking, but please put some clothes on. I don't get any enjoyment from kicking your ass if you don't fight back.
Are you sure you can beat Team Aqua looking like that? Good luck, kid!
Ara ara, what do we have here? I didn't know engineers could be so handsome~
You chose the best grunt for the job!

You are challenged by
Team Aqua Grunt!
Team Aqua here to show you how it's done!
A hidden case for when the player is wearing the Team Aqua hoodie
Really? I mean, really, dude? Go back and change your name!
Oh? You must be a psychic user, aren't you?
Orgies are for girls that win at strip poker, Panty. Better start playing, or you won't get what you want.
Team Magma is here? Time to show them who the better team is!
Followed the better team to the strip club, huh? Don't worry, I'll show you how it's done.
Oh, hell yeah! Count me in!
It would be a shame if someone started mean rumors about you because of this, Nagisa.
Good job, "Daddy". Hope you're proud of yourself.
Don't have such a Rough Skin, Gruntie. You won't ever get laid if you act like that!
Oh no, a little fishy, soooo scary.
Prepare to be blown out of the water, Magma Loser!
This will be the easiest win of my life.
That's… a very impressive costume. That is a costume, right?
You're a musician? Can't be too popular if I can't find you on the internet.
You're Storm? The Storm? We're going to have lots of fun together.
Best bring your A-game if you want to beat Team Aqua.
Team Aqua doesn't lose! Prepare yourselves.
My name isn't important. Just call me Aqua Grunt -- AG for short.
My name? Just call me Aqua Grunt -- AG for short.
Now look at that, ~player~. Who knew you could look so stylish.
Tracks what my costume is
No need to change anything about this.
I'll keep these, thank you very much.
Ha! As expected from a Team Aqua Member, no swap needed!
Come on, be good! Swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Cards, don't betray me now. Swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Let's change it like this. ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Hit me up with ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Hmm... How about ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~?
I'll exchange these ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Come on be good! ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Don't fail me now cards! ~Cards.Text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Giving you my best from the start!
I expect nothing less for a Team Aqua grunt!
Perfect! Not changing a thing about this.
Ha! Try to beat this one, ~player~!
Why mess with perfection?
I ain't losing this round, go look at the others.
Critical hit!
This hand is as flawless as Team Aqua.
The calm before the storm.
As reliable as a Crawdaunt.
A hand fiercer than a Sharpedo!
Almost as trustworthy as my Spheal! Almost.
You don't need to look at me this round, ~player~. I'm not losing it.
You wish your hand was as good as mine, ~player~.
I hope you have your Pokédollars ready for when I win this all, ~player~!
Shelly would be proud if she saw me having this hand! That's my boss, if you didn't know already.
It seems like swimming and Pokémon battles aren't my only good skills.
(Perfect! Just what I need to stay in the game.)
(Ah, just in time. Had this been any worse, I would have to show off just a little too much.)
(I have to say, quite some good-looking people playing today.)
Could have used these earlier, but hey, who am I to complain about a free win?
I will get through this. I'm the best underling around.
Don't count me out yet! You will all go down before me, no matter how many more times I need to win!
Payback time!
I may have been losing the battle, but I will win the war, for Team Aqua!
Even when I am at my lowest, a true Team Aqua member doesn't give up.
I have shown off quite enough by now, time to turn it around.
(Phew, a good hand just when I needed it.)
I'm just going to use this time to show off my legs a little more, don't mind me.
You pushed me far. But I think it's time to flip the script and have me winning again.
Don't count me out just yet. I have my Team Aqua pride to protect!
Uh uh! You won't beat me that easy, ~player~. You must try a little harder than that to beat Team Aqua!
Be happy that all of you managed to get me this far. If Shelly was here, she would have kicked all your asses.
Count yourself lucky that you managed to get this far against me. I won't be losing again.
It seems you can all enjoy my midriff a little longer~
You know what's more fun than seeing me strip? Seeing all of you strip for me instead.
I've been trying to teach Spheal to stay with me even outside her Poké ball, but that little rascal always gets herself in trouble.
The first time Spheal used Bubble was when she was asleep. The sound of bubbles popping right next to her made her jump into the air from the shock. My stomach hurt from all the laughing I did.
Spheal's first victory was against a Team Magma's Poochyena. You should have seen that Team Losers's face when she rolled into her Poochyena and won the fight in one hit!

One time, my Spheal was hungry for some Pokéblocks. I keep mine on a high shelf so that she doesn't eat them all in one go. She managed to get on top of the shelf, only to roll off just before she got to them, which alerted me to what she was doing. Gave her one block for the effort.
My Spheal has been with me since I was 14 years old. She got me through a lot of stuff in my life. She has never left my side and I couldn't be happier with her.

There was this one time when someone thought that my Spheal was a football. He tried to kick her but my Spheal dodged the kick, and proceeded to blast him into the water with a Bubble Beam. Served him right.
Actually, having talked about Spheals, I should tell you all that I got my own little adorable orb. Want to hear some stories about mine? Course you do.
Hmph, you could have given me something better for my first hand, dealer.
Really? That's all you have for me, dealer?
Okay isn't good enough anymore! Let me swap again.
You wouldn't want to make Team Aqua your enemy, right, dealer?
Everyone can see plenty of me already, no need to give me those mediocre cards!
These cards are really testing my patience. Like waiting on a stalling enemy.
I suppose these should get me through this round. No, they're not mediocre, ~player~.
(Being exposed like this, while other people can see me is oddly erotic.)
(All eyes are on me right now. I mean, who wouldn't want to see me like this?)
As a proud Team Aqua grunt! I will not lose this round! (...Maybe.)
(Maybe losing one more round wouldn't be THAT bad, right?) Huh? I was just thinking about something private, eyes on the cards ~player~.
Having an okay hand is starting to become a nuisance. Give me a better hand next time, dealer.
Next time, let me shuffle the cards, dealer. I promise I won't cheat. Hehe...
Maybe it's a good thing that I lost some clothing, keeps things interesting.
Yeah, I've got nothing clever to say.
Such a shame that these are the kind of hands I end up with the most. I'd rather have the certainty of a win or a loss than having to guess.
Wouldn't mind a lucky crit right about now.
I wonder if the others are done modifying the submarine.
With how boring my hand is, I rather have my focus on all of you instead.
Ugh, I hope I don't have to start showing more because of this lousy hand.
Good grunts follow orders.
All kinds of folks walking around here. Some of them with a lot of money on them....Hehehe~
There are a lot of reasons to be part of Team Aqua. The most important part is that we care about Pokémon, unlike a certain other team of losers.
Not good enough to be worthy for a Team Aqua member. But I will make it work.
Do you wonder why I won't give you my name? You don't need to know it. All you need to know is that I am a proud member of Team Aqua!
Say, you wouldn't happen to have some money on you, ~player~?
I just saw someone with a sapphire necklace. Just got to mark down which room they went into for later.
Want to know what I got? Tough luck!
I actually prefer blackjack over poker. Less luck reliant.
This is no Hydro Cannon. I can say that much.
Hey... You wouldn't happen to have some cash on you, would ya ~player~?
It's not like I can change my hand now, so let's see who the loser is going to be this round.
It feels weird not having my Team Aqua bandana on.
I already miss my Team Aqua bandana.
Dealer! You better not be pulling a fast one on Team Aqua!
Oh, so that's how it's going to be, huh?
(I cannot show weakness now. My pride as a Team Aqua member is on the line!)
Team Aqua grunt swapped cards! It was not very effective...
Do you want to sleep with the Wishiwashi, dealer?
(With this hand I will lose for sure! ...But is that really a bad thing right now?)
Me? Losing? Don't you even think about it, ~player~!
(Shelly always said to keep your head cool even when facing defeat. Keep that in mind, show no weakness!)
This...is a perfectly good hand, yup. Nothing bad about this.
If you were going to do me dirty like this, dealer, you could have at least bought me a drink.
Get your ass moving, ~player~. I know I'm handsome and you want to keep looking at me, but having to wait for you every turn gets annoying.
Good thing we aren't playing for money. I wouldn't have a penny left with how this is going.
Did you know that humans used to hunt Lapras to the point they almost went extinct? Team Aqua was not going to let that happen!
Can you believe that there are people that throw car batteries into the ocean? What in the world are they thinking!?
I don't like fishers, even if they throw the Pokémon they catch back into the ocean when they're done. They are still hurting the Pokémon for no other reason than their own amusement!
I would rather walk through a cave full of Zubat than get another hand like this.
It's not that I hate Fire-type Pokémon. On the contrary, I care about all Pokémon. I just don't particularly like them.
Can I use a repel to repel this hand? No? Ugh...
(I should have brought some aces with me before coming here.)
(Well, it seems like I'm going to lose this round. Might as well look around for something valuable to steal before I leave this place.)
I wish Amber was here. He would know what to do with these cards.
Might as well throw these cards to a Sharpedo.
Magikarp using Splash is more useful than this.
Do you want my foot up your ass, dealer?
I'm not mad, just disappointed.
Very funny, now give me my real cards.
I know you all want to see more of me, but giving me bad cards on purpose is just bad sportsmanship.
Do you all want to see more of me this badly?
Aren't you all happy I have shown as much as I have? So why give me these garbage cards!?
Dealer, you should be happy that Matt isn't here. He would've given you the piledriver for giving me this hand.
It's because I'm such a good grunt that a loss more isn't a big deal.
These cards are ass. And no, you all don't get to see my ass...yet.
Yeah, I'm just going to focus on my phone instead. These cards make me unreasonably frustrated.
I'm not mad, this is just my resting bitch face.
(Ah shit. I'm really going to have to show it to them all, huh?)
A Team Aqua grunt deserves better than this!
(Oh....I think I better mentally prepare myself for what's to come.)
I don't mind showing off, far from it. I do, however, mind losing.
Jeez, just look at that butt. You could play bongos on those.
Oh, that's nothing, Fluttershy. Wailord can grow up to be at least 14.5 m! And weight a whopping 400 kg! But I wouldn't really call them just a fish either.
Sure, champ, go get her. I get to see 2 hotties doing it with one another. I call that a win.
Have you seen how many girls are walking around here, Leonie? We should count ourselves lucky we even got one on the table to play with us. And a pretty one at that~
Can't go wrong with some metal, right? Blasting it on my speakers while sailing really gets the blood pumping.
Nothing better than singing sea shanties with the team.
Ever heard of the band Alestorm? Trust me, they go in hard.
Don't worry about it, I have lived many years near sailors and pirates. Trust me when I say that I'm used to it.
It's cute seeing you so worked up about this. But wouldn't losing be so much more fun?
Oh, you know, not much, spotting Pokémon, going for a swim, finding clue's about a mysterious blue orb. Basic stuff really.
Do it! Give us a show to remember!
As if I'm going to give you any of my personal information, I'm older than you are that's all you need to know ya brat.
Just use an ice move and capture them with a Poké ball. No need to kill them!
Oh lord~ Just look at that. Got to stop myself from pinching your cheeks~
Just another day being a Team Aqua grunt. What I'm going to do is a secret~
Oh, sure I am. You just have to bend over first~
Well...At least you're already wet...I should have stayed in bed today.
I heard that Team Magma was active here, so I came to investigate. Stuck around for all the hot guys and girls walking around~
I have already found my passion and pirate group, Meia. I wouldn't trade it for anything in the world.
As a member of Team Aqua, when we heard that Team Magma was spotted here, I was sent to investigate. And I decided to have some fun while doing so.
The cat is out of the bag now. I must say that I preferred the mysterious nature you had around you before you transformed. But what I'm seeing now is fine too~
It's quite the opposite for me, Pyrrha. I don't want to be famous at all, I want my team to be famous instead.
Nothing beats getting a good haul and spending it on new clothes, or toys for my Spheal!
Ah, an animal lover like me then? Just be sure to keep Botan close to you -- there are all kinds of weird people out there who would want to harm him.
What else but blue? The color of the ocean, sapphires, the sky. What's not to love?
Wait...you can't swim? If you came where I come from it would have been suicide. if you come by, I could help you learn.
You know what? You're right about that, Rita. If it wasn't for Poké balls, capturing and bonding with Pokémon would not be this easy.
Ha! As if! Team Aqua is better in every single way, the only one who will have a new humiliating story to tell will be you!
I don't struggle with that at all~ Well, why not come with me after the game, Mercy? I will show you how I'm like~
I've had my fair share of friends like that in the past. But now I'm mostly busy being a Team Aqua grunt, so I don't have much time anymore for it, so who knows what we could end up doing tonight~
It's a nice butt, ~Fluttershy~. No need to be shy about it, show it off all you like.
Do I really need to spell it out, oh mighty Miko? I want Team Aqua to beat Team Magma and bring balance to the world!
Trust me, Mercy. Nothing feels better than to go skinny dipping after a long day of work. You should try it sometime -- I can recommend it.
Good for you, girly! You got to be proud of yourself for coming so far. If you don't celebrate your achievements, who will?
Don't beat yourself up about it -- short people need love too. It helps that they are often light enough to carry around. Hehe~
She says, with a knife in her hand. Are you really sure it's not true?
There is nothing wrong with it, besides the fact that it makes you look like a slut~

Girl, you need to have some more pride in yourself. You look amazing and should be proud of that. And if you aren't proud of yourself, I will bring my friends with me next time and I can assure you that they will say the same thing as me.
My Spheal. Nothing is cuter than my Spheal. It's this small orb like Pokémon that I wouldn't trade for the world.
What do you mean matter cannot be destroyed? If I throw a rock hard enough against a wall it shatters, so it gets destroyed. It's not that difficult to understand.
I mean...You got a good point, but no! You forget the part in which we also stop the ones throwing all the garbage in the ocean! Yeah, that's also a good reason!
Sure kid, knock yourself out.
No risk no reward, kid. Making big steps like these are never easy, and not everyone is willing to take the first step like us.
Do you even listen to me? We aren't getting rid of all land, just a bit here and there that needs change. You would need to hear Archie talk about it-- he does it better than me.
So, what if we put a target on our back? You have to break a few eggs to make an omelet. You'll see.
We aren't raising the sea levels...Right? Yeah, no we aren't! We are just taking parts of other island to add more sea and help Pokémon!
Ha! As if they could do that against us! We are the greatest team Hoenn has ever known. We aren't scared of a few obese businessmen!
As if! Those company people run to their moms the moment they face any kind of resistance. We ain't scared of those cowards.
Duh! That's part of the job after all, why wouldn't it be the case?
That's part of it yeah, why wouldn't it be?
Silly girl! We aren't planning to take all the land or something, just enough so that the ocean can be repaired, duh.
Have some faith in my boss. Archie knows what he is doing, and he wouldn't go too far or anything.
You couldn't have piqued my interest more if you tried. You've got to tell me more!
You got me all excited over here. You've got to tell me more.
Of course my boss did that. I'm not some kind of maniac, you know. Team Aqua's goal is to help the ocean after all.
Your butt is almost as big as your tits. What in the world did they feed you when you were younger?
Oh, so now you're just going to show off your ass all the time? Just because it's bigger than mine? Hmph!
So that's were all those hamburgers went.
Your cheeks are big enough to play bongos on.
Maybe you shouldn't be the type to sit on someone's face. They would never be able to breathe lying under your ass.
Spankable, but don't let her know you think that way about her.
Now that I look at it, her butt is way better than mine... Hm? I wasn't staring at her butt, ~player~!
Your ass is as big as your ego.
That's quite the sight. At least you're good looking at that department.
Could I survive her sitting on my face?
I wouldn't mind seeing that from up close.
Don't be surprised if you suddenly feel your ass getting slapped.
Spankable~
I'd need both my hands trying to grope all that cheek you got there.
That looks like it can take a pounding, just like how Team Magma keeps taking a pounding from Team Aqua!
Urge, to spank, is rising. Got to control myself. No, I wasn't thinking of anything, ~player~.
I bet that you secretly like it up the butt, Magma Grunt.
Crawdaunt really are the most reliable crustaceans there are. When they use Crunch, it's over for the enemy Pokémon.
They might be reliable, but Crawdaunt have this weird habit of wanting to snap your panties in half. So you always have to watch out for them whenever you are sun bathing.
Have you ever seen a Spheal? They're these adorable round Pokémon with boundless energy. You won't find a fire Pokémon even half as cute as it.
Spheal are more than meets the eye, you know. They can evolve into Sealeo, and then after that, into a mighty Walrein! Beware those ivory tusks.
Sharpedo really are the best to traverse the waters with. If you want to go somewhere fast, then they're your best bet.
If you ever see two Sharpedo fighting one another while swimming, you better take a different route. Those two could be fighting for days on end.
Wait, we don't get any money when we win? Not even a little? Well crap, and here I wanted to buy some new clothes tomorrow.
I know this is strip poker, but doesn't the winner get at least something? Like even just a little bit of money? No? Shame...
Shelly is the reason I became a Team Aqua member in the first place. Her style and grace are unmatched— I really look up to her.
Shelly is the beauty of the 7 seas. Without her, Team Aqua would not be the same.
It is fun to get a lucky crit in when it really counts, but those kinds of victories just don't feel the same. I have my pride after all.
These days there are more Lapras than ever! With the help of Team Aqua, of course.
It is because of Team Aqua, that there are plenty of Lapras swimming around again.
Fishers don't use hooks anymore? Just lure on a stick that they bite on? Couldn't they have done that from the start?
Well, I'll be damned! They don't use hooks anymore? Just lures on a stick? Why didn't they just do that from the beginning!?
Wait! People aren't throwing car batteries into the ocean? It's just a meme?
What do you mean that it's just a meme? People wouldn't lie on the internet! Right?
Who's Amber, you ask? Well wouldn't you like to know, huh? Hehe.
The only thing you need to know is that Amber is one of the best Team Aqua members we have!

Matt is one of my bosses, a big hunk of a guy that managed to punch a Snorlax in the face with such power that it didn't wake up from it! (Or maybe it was just sleepy and didn't want to stand up after that.)
Matt is quite the dreamy guy, and a great muscle if you ever need something heavy be moved. (Even if he isn't the smartest around.)
(It can't just be me who is getting hot from all of this right? I should really take a swim after all of this is done.)
I could really go for some skinny dipping after this. The heat is killing me.
Why do I have this weird feeling that I'm about to get spanked?
I saw you trying to get a glimpse, ~player~. So here. Enjoy.
Do I need a reason to show off my amazing behind? No, no I don't.
And? What do you think of my butt, ~player~? Pretty great, isn't it?
My butt is more of a cupcake than just a straight up cake, but there is nothing wrong with that.
I think my behind is just as amazing as my chest, wouldn't you agree? ~player~?
I work hard to get my butt to look this nice, so a compliment would be appreciated!
You got me this far, so here is a little reward~
Should I just drop my panties and show you what I really got? ...Neh~
So? What do you think is better, ~player~? My chest or my butt? Trick question, they are both perfect.
Want me to bend over for you? ~player~? Too bad.
I wouldn't mind if you kissed my butt right about now~
I could really use a seat right now. Who's volunteering?
I could show you my asshole, but I don't think you earned it just yet.
Can you imagine putting your cock in between my cheeks and hotdogging me? If you're lucky, it won't be an imagination for much longer~
It's not my butt that you have to look out for, but my thighs. I've crushed a water melon before with these. You might not believe me, but neither did my friends until I showed them.
Imagine having my behind to look at for an entire night. Keep trying your luck and maybe you'll be lucky tonight~
Okay, okay, I'll take something off. But in exchange you better listen to what I have to say about Team Aqua's goal!
You know what? Why talk about clothes right now? Let me tell you something really important instead. Team Aqua's goal!
Okay, okay, I'll take something off. But in exchange you better listen to what I have to say about Team Aqua's goal!

Well duh, of course I wanted to track you down. We are sworn enemies after all. I have to know what you sneaky nerds are up to. But I didn't know that Team Magma were such perverts, spending time in a strip poker joint.
Have you even been in a single Pokémon battle? Water beats fire, you Cascoon-for-brains.
Oh, my mistake. I thought you were using a Ligma.
Ugh, you have no idea how mad this makes me. Not only do I lose my most precious Team Aqua bandana, but a Team Coward member sees me doing it. I'll get you back for this, girly.
No, I don't have Miltanks like yours. But I can assure you, there is plenty to love here~

Oh please, ~player~ only really has one choice. I mean, just look at how flexible I am. I'm built for all kind of positions~ There is a lot to love with a girl like her, but I'm an adventure on my own~
Yes, she can! Yesterday, she protected me from a group of Wingull, by slamming into them as they tried to steal my fries!
You hit the nail right on the head there, Yuno. I'm all that, and much, much more.
You would be correct, lady Heris. But I'm far more than just a simple pirate.
Have you seen all the garbage humans throw in the ocean without care? Like, for real? Hmph! We got to fix that, one way or another!
If only it was as simple as it seemed. The truth is that the ocean is being polluted beyond fixing. At least that's what Archie told me.
My job is both my name and my passion. So just keep calling me Aqua Grunt, or AG for short.
Thanks, Kumatora. Don't you worry about me though, I always carry sunscreen with me. And I gotta say, you're rocking that pink hair!
Don't worry about me, Kumatora. I always have sunscreen with me. And I gotta say, girl, that hair of yours rocks! It really fits you.
I'm all natural, baby. And I ain't afraid to show it~
Someone who sees my best qualities from the start, a rare sight these days. But you're right, they are real~
What could ever give you that impression, Saki? Hehe~
I ride the deep sea on a daily basis, Revy. Maybe you're just not cut out for it.
Not everyone can tame the sea, Revy. What kind of pirate can't handle a bit of water?
This is a costume, yeah. I'm part of an elite team that is bent on restoring balance to our world.
Was it that obvious? But you're correct, Mari. I set sail all the time.
The goal isn't to fill the world with just more water. The goal is to let people know and see the beauty of the ocean along with the Pokémon living in it.
The world is blue enough once the Water-type Pokémon are free from all the filth humans throw in the ocean.
You wouldn't be too far off there, Estelle. You could consider Team Aqua to be one big naval guild, our main objective being to protect the vulnerable sea Pokémon.
Because I'm just here to have a little fun, that's all~
Well, you see my dear, Fluttershy. Our genius leader has located an artifact that will allow us to ask the aid of a legendary Pokémon to help us!
That's right, I'm Team Aqua's number one Grunt, and I am proud of that!
It's my job title, I'm an elite grunt for Team Aqua. So call me Aqua Grunt, or AG for short.
The grunt part is simply my status in the team. Though, I'm the highest ranking grunt of the bunch!
I'm proud to be a grunt for Team Aqua. Besides, I'm also the highest ranking one.
And who are you to judge me, kid?
Big words coming from someone that came out of the clown store. So what's your deal?
It's beautiful. I've spent hours looking at the vast horizon. I can never get enough of it.
There is nothing more beautiful than looking at the ocean on a warm summer morning.
I do have a real name. But I have no desire to tell you that, so just call me Aqua Grunt, Or AG for short.
I'm proud to be from Team Aqua. Given I'm currently on duty, I won't be telling you my real name anytime soon. So you can call me Aqua grunt or AG for short.
Ha! What kind of question is that? Only the best of course. But the biggest benefit of them all is the pride of saving Pokémon from evil.
We get plenty of benefits, but the most important one is the sense of pride that you get saving Pokémon.
Let's say, my family and the ocean go way back. I learned how to swim at the age of four.
I've been around the ocean for as long as I can remember, Trixie. Learning to swim at an early age was kind of important.
Of course I'm honest when it's about Team Aqua.
You can ask me anything regarding Team Aqua, Amy.
You won't find a bigger lover of animals than me, I can promise you that. Sure, I love some more than others but still.
Hell yeah! I love all animals. Maybe some less than others, but there is no animal that I don't care for.
I have a regular name, but I rather not tell what it is in a strip joint of all places. So just keep calling me Aqua Grunt.
I do, but I'm not telling. Aqua Grunt should be a perfectly fine name to call me for as long as I'm here.

It's a bit much to talk about, so let me explain. Team Aqua's main plan is to fix the ocean and the damage humans have been doing to it. Archie, my boss, opened my eyes to this when he was looking for people to come help him with this goal.
Animals and plants I've never seen? You got yourself a deal, lady, but do tell me more about this place of yours.
What in the world are you talking about, girl? What in the world is Helicia? Is it a city?
I don't know what kind of pirate you think I am, but I've never heard of a Helicia. Is it a city?
Hey! We are not evil just because we get in trouble with Officer Jenny.
Shows what you know, we are on the good side. No matter what Officer Jenny says.
That sounds like absolute paradise, all the space in the world for water Pokémon. And humans don't take unnecessary land, win-win. So, tell me about it.
Sounds like the perfect world to me, what's not to love? Everyone would win in the end if the world was like that, how is this planed?
Our plan has been thought out by our smartest members, and not to mention by our amazing leader! I'm sure they know what they are doing.
Of course it's a good idea! Archie said so. And I trust him with my life, so don't you worry your pretty little head about it.
We aren't fishers! In fact, we are against fishing!
